intro.description: This step creates a project to store the xtUML models

item.title: Create xtUML project
item.description: Right-click on the Model Explorer view, then select New > xtUML Project . Name it 'Simple System'. Click Next >.

item.title: Select a model compiler
item.description: The wizard now presents you with page to select the desired model compiler. Select 'C Model Compiler (Binary)' from the list, then click Finish.

item.title: Open System Model diagram
item.description: Double-click on the project name in the Model Explorer
